name: Goldiny Casino
description:
This was made for the  GMTK GameJam (2022)

Roll once, twice, or more! Then fight for the gold!

Roll the dices to get coins.  The number of coins on the box will be the amount of enemies that appear in the battle section, meaning that it will be more difficult, but also the reward will be better. When you feel that there is enough coins, start the battle to win some gold!. 

Each enemy drops at least 1 gold. There are 7 types of enemies that will appear depending on the amount of coins, each of them with their own gold value. If an enemy touches the purple bar, you lose the game and all of the gold you would have gained from the round.

If you have 100 or more gold, you can gamble them in a roulette. You can get:

> Gold x2: During this round, the gold you gain will be multiplied by 2.

> Shield +1: During this round, you can get hit once without losing.

> +100 Gold: You recover 100 gold
